info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:26PM CDT until June 13 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Northern Wood County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Southern Morris County in northeastern Texas... Southern Titus County in northeastern Texas... Camp County in northeastern Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Fork Reservoir, or 12 miles north of Mineola, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, Quitman, Lone Star, Cason, Cookville, Scroggins, Lake Fork Reservoir, Pleasant Grove, Jenkins, Newsome, Purley, Forest Hill, Winfield, Alba and Yantis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
